# Digiteka

## Example

### Basic

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="1"
  type="digiteka"
  layout="responsive"
  data-mdtk="01212121"
  data-zone="1"
  data-adunit="/accountId/AdUnitCode"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration semantics, please [contact Digiteka](http://digiteka.com).

Supported parameters:

-   `mdtk` (required)
-   `zone` (required)
-   `adunit` (optionnal)
